title: Handouts: Language Index
description: The Immunization Action Coalition (IAC) provides Chinese-language translations of handouts and print materials about vaccines for healthcare providers and their patients.
cleaned_text: | | | | (ARCHIVE) |TRANSLATIONS| | | | | | | |This website is supported in part by a cooperative agreement from the National Center for Immunization and Respiratory Diseases (Grant No. 1NH23IP922654) at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) in Atlanta, GA. The website content is the sole responsibility of IAC and does not necessarily represent the official views
